languages.text: "У вас должно хватить ума не убивать на месте причастных, а сперва допросить их о других мятежниках, чтобы развернуть последовательную серию дознаний и наказаний. В остальном подход верный".

"I hope your subordinates will have the presence of mind not to kill the culprits on the spot and instead question them, learn the identities of other rebels, and carry out a series of interrogations and punishments first. Other than that, the approach is valid."
languages.original_text: "У вас должно хватить ума не убивать на месте причастных, а сперва допросить их о других мятежниках, чтобы развернуть последовательную серию дознаний и наказаний. В остальном подход верный".

traits.locale_text: "I hope your subordinates will have the presence of mind not to kill the culprits on the spot and first question them, learn the identities of other rebels, and carry out a series of interrogations and punishments. Other than that, the approach is valid."

"I hope your subordinates will have the presence of mind not to kill the culprits on the spot and instead question them, learn the identities of other rebels, and carry out a series of interrogations and punishments first. Other than that, the approach is valid."

languages.text: “我希望你的属下能冷静些，不要当场杀死罪犯。先审讯他们，了解其他叛乱分子的身份，之后再进行一系列拷问与惩罚。除了这点之外，这个方案确实可行。”
languages.original_text: "I hope your subordinates will have the presence of mind not to kill the culprits on the spot and instead question them, learn the identities of other rebels, and carry out a series of interrogations and punishments first. Other than that, the approach is valid."

traits.locale_text: “我希望你的属下能冷静些，不要当场杀死罪犯。先审讯他们，了解其他叛乱分子的身份，之后再进行一系列拷问与惩罚。除了这点之外，这个方案确实可行。”

languages.text: «Espero que sus subordinados sean lo bastante sensatos como para no matar a los culpables antes de interrogarlos, descubrir la identidad de otros rebeldes y realizar toda una serie de interrogaciones y castigos. Por lo demás, su estrategia es válida».
languages.original_text: "I hope your subordinates will have the presence of mind not to kill the culprits on the spot and instead question them, learn the identities of other rebels, and carry out a series of interrogations and punishments first. Other than that, the approach is valid."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que sus subordinados sean lo bastante sensatos como para no matar a los culpables antes de interrogarlos, descubrir la identidad de otros rebeldes y realizar toda una serie de interrogaciones y castigos. Por lo demás, su estrategia es válida».

languages.text: « J'espère que vos subordonnés auront la présence d'esprit de ne pas éliminer immédiatement les coupables et de prendre le temps de les interroger, de découvrir l'identité des autres rebelles et enfin de les punir de manière adéquate. Cette approche me semble néanmoins valide. »
languages.original_text: "I hope your subordinates will have the presence of mind not to kill the culprits on the spot and instead question them, learn the identities of other rebels, and carry out a series of interrogations and punishments first. Other than that, the approach is valid."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que vos subordonnés auront la présence d'esprit de ne pas éliminer immédiatement les coupables et de prendre le temps de les interroger, de découvrir l'identité des autres rebelles et enfin de les punir de manière adéquate. Cette approche me semble néanmoins valide. »

languages.text: 「あなたの部下たちが、その場で犯人を殺すのではなく、冷静さを保って尋問を行い、他の反乱者の身元を突き止め、まず一連の尋問と処罰を実施してくれることを願っています。それ以外のやり方については妥当です」
languages.original_text: "I hope your subordinates will have the presence of mind not to kill the culprits on the spot and instead question them, learn the identities of other rebels, and carry out a series of interrogations and punishments first. Other than that, the approach is valid."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの部下たちが、その場で犯人を殺すのではなく、冷静さを保って尋問を行い、他の反乱者の身元を突き止め、まず一連の尋問と処罰を実施してくれることを願っています。それ以外のやり方については妥当です」

languages.text: "Umarım astlarınız suçluları buldukları yerde öldürmek yerine onları sorgulayıp diğer isyancıların kimliklerini öğrenecek ve bir dizi sorgulama ile cezalandırma gerçekleştirecek kadar zekidir. Bunun dışında yaklaşımınız geçerli."
languages.original_text: "I hope your subordinates will have the presence of mind not to kill the culprits on the spot and instead question them, learn the identities of other rebels, and carry out a series of interrogations and punishments first. Other than that, the approach is valid."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım astlarınız suçluları buldukları yerde öldürmek yerine onları sorgulayıp diğer isyancıların kimliklerini öğrenecek ve bir dizi sorgulama ile cezalandırma gerçekleştirecek kadar zekidir. Bunun dışında yaklaşımınız geçerli."

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, Eure Untergebenen sind so klug, die Schuldigen nicht sofort zu töten, sondern befragen sie stattdessen, um die Identität weiterer Rebellen zu erfahren. Am Anfang stehen stets Verhöre und Bestrafungen. Abgesehen davon ist der Ansatz durchaus brauchbar."
languages.original_text: "I hope your subordinates will have the presence of mind not to kill the culprits on the spot and instead question them, learn the identities of other rebels, and carry out a series of interrogations and punishments first. Other than that, the approach is valid."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, Eure Untergebenen sind so klug, die Schuldigen nicht sofort zu töten, sondern befragen sie stattdessen, um die Identität weiterer Rebellen zu erfahren. Am Anfang stehen stets Verhöre und Bestrafungen. Abgesehen davon ist der Ansatz durchaus brauchbar."
